overview: 'Frost' is a trap-based hyper-pop song from TXT's second studio album, The Chaos Chapter: FREEZE, that compares the mind of a confused boy to 'frost' after realizing his own destiny. The music video is a continuation to the original story 'The Star Seekers', which tells the growth of five special boys.
title: TXT (TOMORROW X TOGETHER) 'Frost'
